long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🐦🔥 Flappy Bird (Super) – Fly Higher, Fly Invincible! 🎮

Take flight in Flappy Bird (Super), the addictive flying game with a new twist! Flap your way through endless pipes, and when things get tough—touch the fire power-up to become invincible. Soar through obstacles, rack up points, and aim to beat your personal best, which updates in real-time in the bottom-left corner. How far can you go before crashing?

🌟 Why Install This Game?
Classic Gameplay + New Power-up: Tap to fly, avoid pipes, and activate invincibility by touching fire!
Real-Time Score Tracking: Keep an eye on your highest score as you play.
Endless Fun: Simple yet challenging mechanics that keep you coming back.
Instant Play: No downloads required—play in your browser anytime!
Unblocked Version: Play at home, work, or school without restrictions.
📌 What’s Inside?

Game Menu at the top-left for easy navigation
Fullscreen mode for an immersive experience 🕹️
Rate & Share buttons at the bottom-right—challenge your friends to beat your score!
🚀 Ready to become invincible and set a new high score? Download now and see how far you can fly! 🐦🔥
